## Runtime.SimpleContextQualifierProvider.get() method

Gets a qualifier value by its name, index, or qualifier object.

**Signature:**

```typescript
get(nameOrIndexOrQualifier: QualifierName | QualifierIndex | Qualifier): Result<QualifierContextValue>;
```

</td><td>

The [qualifier name](./ts-res.qualifiername.md)<!-- -->, [index](./ts-res.qualifierindex.md)<!-- -->, or [qualifier object](./ts-res.qualifiers.qualifier.md) to look up.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

Result&lt;[QualifierContextValue](./ts-res.qualifiercontextvalue.md)<!-- -->&gt;

`Success` with the [qualifier context value](./ts-res.qualifiercontextvalue.md) if found, or `Failure` with an error message if not found or an error occurs.
